pli-tv-kd20:1.3.11: Atha kho āyasmā ānando → atha kho āyasmato ānandassa etadahosi (@an8.51#1 [51. Gotamīsutta])
pli-tv-kd20:9.3.11: Tena kho pana samayena → tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū (s1-3, km)
pli-tv-kd20:9.4.18: bhikkhave, dve tisso bhikkhuniyo → dvīhi tīhi bhikkhunīhi (s1-3); dve tisso bhikkhunīhi (pts1, mr)
pli-tv-kd20:10.4.3: naccaṃ → sanaccaṃ (bj, s1-3, pts1) | samajjaṃ (mr) | harītakapakkikaṃ → haritakapattikaṃ (s1-3); harītakapaṇṇikaṃ (pts1, mr)
pli-tv-kd20:15.1.17: paṭiggāhāpetvā → paṭiggahāpetvā (s1-3, pts1, mr) | bhikkhunīhi → bhikkhunīhi bhikkhūhi (bj, s1-3, pts1)
pli-tv-kd20:15.2.17: sannidhiṃ bhikkhūhi → bhikkhūhi bhikkhunīhi (bj, s1-3, pts1)
pli-tv-kd20:19.1.15: bhikkhave, pacchābhattaṃ → bhikkhave bhikkhuniyā pacchābhattaṃ (s1-3, km)
pli-tv-kd20:27.4.100: sālokena naccena ca → sāloke sanaccena ca (bj); sālokena sanaccanaṃ (s1-3); sālokena sanaccena ca (pts1)
